title: 117. …But Helth Part 2 Ft. Dr. Russell Surasky
itunes:title: 117. …But Helth Part 2 Ft. Dr. Russell Surasky
description:
You have the right to be whoever you want to be in America but we need to draw a line when a small percentage of the population propagate an agenda and capitalize on spreading fear. On today’s episode, Andy and the crew are joined again by Dr. Russell Surasky, the only triple board-certified neurologist in the United States as they discuss the science and truth behind vaccines, COVID-19, misinformation spread by the media and the solution for it all.

LINKS MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE:

  • Book Andy to Be on Your Podcast
  • Follow Andy on Instagram
  • Follow Andy on Facebook
  • Take complete control of your life - 75 HARD
  • Get my raw & uncensored advice about success & life delivered to you daily!
